title: German Type Foundry
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230421/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230421/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : German Type Foundry - GTF**

GTF is a type label dedicated to serious workhorse and corporate typefaces. It was founded by [Ingo Preuss](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230421/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ingo%20Preuss) and [Andreas Seidel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230421/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andreas%20Seidel) in 2006.

author: andreas
